scripts.build-js: browserify js/main.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -o build/main.js
scripts.release-js: NODE_ENV=production browserify js/main.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react babili ] ] | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 --compress --mangle --output build/main.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js & npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.release: npm run release-js & npm run release-css
